title: Situation for Two-Way Table
question_text: In which situation could one summarize the data in a two-way table?

choices.text:
Select
15
 males
and
15
 females
and determine if the males score higher on the ACT than the females.

Select
15
 males
and determine if their ACT scores are higher this year than the national average.

Select
15
 males
and determine the proportion of them who vote for Republican.

Select
15
 males
and
15
 females
and determine by gender the proportions of each who vote for the Republican.

Select
15
 males
and determine whether a relationship exists between income and political preference.
